desc:
A creature wearing a black turban steps out of the sudden fog. It is roughly the size and shape of a short man, with gray skin and pointed teeth. The thing sneers as it summons lightning to its hand, the air suddenly stinking of ozone. Its stony gray skin shifts to an icy blue as it raises its arm to direct its electrical attack._  
**Elemental Remnants.** When an undead with the ability to raise more of their kind, such as a Open Game License
name: Ghul

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ghul makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Paralyzing Throes
special_abilities.desc: When the ghul dies, it explodes in a puff of noxious smoke. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The ghul has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

special_abilities.name: Variable Immunity
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the ghul changes one of its damage resistances to immunity to that type of damage until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The ghul's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: chill touch, fire bolt, ray of frost, shocking grasp
3/day each: fog cloud, rolling thunder, misty step, spire of stone
1/day each: blur, fireball, gaseous form, frozen razors, stinking cloud
